pr_title: GEODE-7852: Adding a SocketFactory configuration for client Pools

timeline.message:
GEODE-7852: Adding a SocketFactory configuration for client Pools

Adding the ability to provide a SocketFactory to a client pool for use in
creating sockets. Adding an implementation of this SocketFactory that
configures the pool to use an SNI proxy.

GEODE-7837: SNI proxy automated test

Adding an automated test of the SniSocketFactory

GEODE-7837: SNI proxy automated test

Adding an automated test of the SniSocketFactory

key to the client
